name: Great Flame
description:
Great Flame is a 3D adventure game with role-playing game (RPG) elements. Take on the role of a traveler who has magical powers and go on a dangerous adventure to explore the depths of the dungeon! You have to clear locations from monsters and elite bosses using magical weapons! Overcome dangerous traps and obstacles in various locations. Help strangers with their problems and tasks! Check every room carefully because danger can lurk everywhere!

Order and peace flourished in the world, an eternal flame protected these lands. And this went on for a long time. But darkness broke out and extinguished the eternal flame. Monsters have broken out and are threatening civilians. You have a long way to go and return the power to the eternal flame!

Game Features:
- Colorful graphics
- Dangerous opponents
- Nice soundtrack
